entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #55776
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55775
  • IssuerAddress not being set in OpenidConnectHandler.HandleChallengeAsyncInternal #55774
  • Databinding in Blazor: Is it possible to use Complex type as a property type on a Component for databinding? #55773
  • UserManager.AddToRolesAsync() and RemoveFromRolesAsync() fail on any conflict #55772
  • blazor+winforms start failed with FileNotFoundException #55771
  • Blazor 8 - delegating handler cannot use local/session storage #55770
  • Allow specifying exact authentication schemes in AuthenticationMiddleware. #55766
  • Call `onClosed` or provide an `onStopped` method to be called when the connection is stopped in certain cases #55765
  • With Blazor .NET 8, using JSHost.ImportAsync in component in a Razor Class Library (RCL) to load a collocated JavaScript module doesn't appear to work #55764
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55761

Closed

  • FileStreamResultExecutor does not support DisposeAsync #55441
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #55742
  • Perf improvement: json_spring #55754
  • Perf regression: mapaction #55762
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #55755
  • Blazor.webassembly.js - Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild') #55518

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `fa6de7f` to `33af80a` #55767
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.7 #55759
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.32 #55758
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Use DisposeAsync in FileStreamResultExecutor #55524
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix minor issues in `[Typed]Results` docs #55747
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • Add .NET 9 nightly NuGet feed and remove .NET 7 #55680
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc
